provider for Analysis

Andrew Bruce

Source: vignettes/articles/partb-stats.Rmd
partb-stats.Rmd
library(provider)
library(tidyverse)
#> Error in library(tidyverse): there is no package called 'tidyverse'
library(gt)
library(gtExtras)

utilization() 

# Retrieve provider's overall utilization data
ind     <- map_dfr(util_years(), ~utilization(year = .x, npi = 1043477615, type = "provider"))
#> Error in map_dfr(util_years(), ~utilization(year = .x, npi = 1043477615, : could not find function "map_dfr"
# Retrieve state & national chronic condition data to compare with
chronic <- compare_conditions(ind)
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'ind' not found
# Retrieve provider's utilization data by HCPCS
srvc    <- map_dfr(util_years(), ~utilization(year = .x, npi = 1023076643, type = "service"))
#> Error in map_dfr(util_years(), ~utilization(year = .x, npi = 1023076643, : could not find function "map_dfr"
# Retrieve state & national HCPCS data to compare with
hcpcs   <- compare_hcpcs(srvc)
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'srvc' not found

Overall Performance 

ind |> 
  unnest(performance) |> 
  select(year, tot_hcpcs:.pymt_per_srvc) |> 
  gt_preview(top_n = 30) |> 
  opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "Fira Code")) |> 
  fmt_currency(columns = starts_with("avg_"), decimals = 0)
#> Error in unnest(ind, performance): could not find function "unnest"
ind |> 
  unnest(performance) |> 
  select(year, tot_hcpcs:tot_srvcs) |> 
  change(!year) |> 
  gt_preview(top_n = 30) |> 
  opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "Fira Code")) |> 
  fmt_currency(columns = starts_with("avg_"), decimals = 0)
#> Error in unnest(ind, performance): could not find function "unnest"
ind |> 
  unnest(performance) |> 
  select(year, tot_charges:tot_payment) |> 
  change(!year) |> 
  gt_preview(top_n = 30) |> 
  opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "Fira Code")) |> 
  fmt_currency(columns = starts_with("avg_"), decimals = 0)
#> Error in unnest(ind, performance): could not find function "unnest"
ind |> 
  unnest(performance) |> 
  select(year, .copay_deduct:.pymt_per_srvc) |> 
  change(!year) |> 
  gt_preview(top_n = 30) |> 
  opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "Fira Code")) |> 
  fmt_currency(columns = starts_with("avg_"), decimals = 0)
#> Error in unnest(ind, performance): could not find function "unnest"

HCPCS Utilization Data 

srvc |> 
  group_by(year, family) |> 
  mutate(hcpcs_level = dplyr::min_rank(dplyr::pick(avg_allowed, avg_payment))) |> 
  select(year, hcpcs, level = hcpcs_level, family, avg_allowed, avg_payment) |> 
  arrange(year, family, level) |> 
  gt_preview(top_n = 30) |> 
  opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "Fira Code")) |> 
  fmt_currency(columns = starts_with("avg_"), decimals = 0)
#> Error in arrange(select(mutate(group_by(srvc, year, family), hcpcs_level = dplyr::min_rank(dplyr::pick(avg_allowed, : could not find function "arrange"
hcpcs |> 
  group_by(year, level, subcategory) |>
  summarise(Beneficiaries = sum(beneficiaries),
            Services = sum(services),
            "Average Payment" = mean(avg_payment), .groups = "drop") |>
  arrange(year, subcategory) |>
  gt(rowname_col = "year") |> 
  cols_align("left", level) |> 
  cols_move_to_start(columns = subcategory) |> 
  fmt_integer(columns = c(Beneficiaries, Services)) |> 
  fmt_currency(columns = c('Average Payment'), decimals = 2) |> 
  opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "JetBrains Mono")) |>
  tab_header(title = md("**Medicare Part B** Utilization")) |> 
  opt_horizontal_padding(scale = 2) |> 
  tab_options(table.width = pct(50),
              column_labels.font.weight = "bold",
              row_group.font.weight = "bold",
              heading.background.color = "black",
              heading.align = "left") |> 
  opt_all_caps()
#> Error in arrange(summarise(group_by(hcpcs, year, level, subcategory), : could not find function "arrange"


srvc |> 
  select(year, 
         hcpcs, 
         family, 
         tot_benes, 
         tot_srvcs, 
         avg_charge, 
         avg_allowed, 
         avg_payment) |> 
  group_by(year, family) |> 
  summarise(tot_benes = sum(tot_benes),
            tot_srvcs = sum(tot_srvcs),
            avg_charge = mean(avg_charge), 
            avg_allowed = mean(avg_allowed), 
            avg_payment = mean(avg_payment), .groups = "drop") |>
  arrange(family) |> 
  gt(rowname_col = "year") |> 
  fmt_currency(columns = starts_with("avg_"), decimals = 0) |>
  cols_label(
    tot_benes = "Beneficiaries",
    tot_srvcs = "Services",
    avg_charge = "Charge",
    avg_allowed= "Allowed",
    avg_payment = "Payment") |> 
  opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "JetBrains Mono")) |> 
  opt_all_caps()
#> Error in arrange(summarise(group_by(select(srvc, year, hcpcs, family, : could not find function "arrange"
hcpcs |> 
  select(year, 
         level,
         hcpcs,
         category,
         subcategory,
         family, 
         beneficiaries, 
         services, 
         avg_charge, 
         avg_allowed, 
         avg_payment) |> 
  arrange(hcpcs, year) |>
  gt(rowname_col = "year") |> 
  cols_label(
    hcpcs = "HCPCS",
    avg_charge = "Charge",
    avg_allowed= "Allowed",
    avg_payment = "Payment") |> 
  cols_align(columns = "level", align = "left") |>
  fmt_integer(columns = c(beneficiaries, services)) |>
  fmt_currency(columns = starts_with("avg_"), decimals = 0) |>
  opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "JetBrains Mono")) |> 
  opt_all_caps()
#> Error in arrange(select(hcpcs, year, level, hcpcs, category, subcategory, : could not find function "arrange"

Demographics 

ind |> 
  unnest(performance, demographics) |> 
  select(year, tot_benes, starts_with("bene_")) |> 
  gt(rowname_col = "year") |> 
  cols_label(tot_benes = "Total") |>  
  fmt_percent(columns = starts_with("cc_"), decimals = 0) |>
  opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "JetBrains Mono")) |> 
  sub_missing(missing_text = "") |>
  sub_zero(zero_text = "") |>
  opt_all_caps()
#> Error in unnest(ind, performance, demographics): could not find function "unnest"

Chronic Conditions 

ind |> 
  unnest(performance) |> 
  select(year, tot_benes, conditions) |> 
  unnest(conditions) |>
  gt(rowname_col = "year") |> 
  cols_label(tot_benes = "Total") |>  
  fmt_percent(columns = starts_with("cc_"), decimals = 0) |>
  opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "JetBrains Mono")) |> 
  sub_missing(missing_text = "") |>
  sub_zero(zero_text = "") |>
  opt_all_caps()
#> Error in unnest(select(unnest(ind, performance), year, tot_benes, conditions), : could not find function "unnest"


Comparison: Chronic Conditions 

chronic |>
  # filter(prevalence > 0)
  # filter(!if_any(contains("20"), ~ . <= 0)) |>
  pivot_wider(names_from = year, 
              values_from = prevalence) |>
  gt(rowname_col = "level") |> 
  fmt_percent(columns = contains('0'), decimals = 0) |>
  opt_table_font(font = google_font(name = "JetBrains Mono")) |> 
  sub_missing(missing_text = "") |> 
  cols_nanoplot(
    columns = starts_with("20"),
    plot_type = "bar",
    new_col_name = "change",
    new_col_label = "change",
    missing_vals = "remove",
    options = nanoplot_options(
      show_data_line = FALSE,
      show_data_area = FALSE,
      data_bar_stroke_color = "transparent"
    )
  )
#> Error in pivot_wider(chronic, names_from = year, values_from = prevalence): could not find function "pivot_wider"
